overview:
Troy Townsend has 10 years experience in the advertising, promotions and media industries. He has worked across Europe, North America and Australasia and is now the Co- founder and Chief Client Officer at Tiger Pistol.

Troy launched his career initially in London, where he worked with a leading advertising agency - servicing some top-flight international clients. Troy then set his sights on the North American market where he honed his technological and digital innovation skills.

In North America he created and managed some game-changing interactive promotions for leading clients including The Home Depot, AOL, Nestle, Pepsi and SUBWAY Restaurants.

Now at Tiger Pistol, Troy has the opportunity to create bleeding-edge campaigns using what he thinks is the next generation of DIY social media tool that give todays brands greater social reach and understanding of how their consumers engage with their brand.
